I'm Vikyath - Software developer by Passion. Love the tech world to the bones. I was always a curious cat towards computers since 12 y/o, and this inkling pushed me to know more about what happens underneath, and here I am 🚶🏼‍♂️

I am more inclined to Web application developement in general. Web Dev is where my strong point is at, yet still curious about distributed systems and performance optimization in microservice architectures 🏛️. Programming languages and Web frameworks that I love 👇🏼
